PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-05412023-06-09ISED
ActStatistics Act
PrecisReappointment of ANIL ARORA of Ottawa, Ontario, as Chief Statistician of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on March 31, 2024, effective June 14, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of ANIL ARORA of Ottawa, Ontario, as Chief Statistician of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on March 31, 2024, effective June 14, 2023.
